results.title: Experience with bisoprolol in long-QT1 and long-QT2 syndrome.
results.text_hl: Recent reports have suggested that beta-blockers are not equally effective in @<m>DISEASE_Post_Acute_COVID_19_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094024 @@@Long-QT@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Post_Acute_COVID_19_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094024 @@@LQT@@@).
